attributes.action: reform the voting system with the introduction of a "none of the above" option to all voting slips which could result in another ballot but with new candidates
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the bottom of all voting slips should be a box marked "none of the above".  At the count should this box receive more votes than any candidate, the election should be repeated but none of the original candidates should be allowed to stand.  This will mean that a vote actually can be used to "vote out" as easily as "vote in" politicians.
